message: I'll play 5. To avoid collisions, P1 pick 1 and P2 pick 3 so we all advance safely. If either of you was planning 5, switch — collisions help nobody.
Agreed. I'll go 1. P2, take 3 so we all advance. Let's keep coordinating like this.
Sounds good. I'll take 3 as suggested. Let's stick to this plan and avoid any collisions. Looking forward to us all advancing this round.

Locked in at 5 this round. P1 please play 1 and P2 please play 3 as agreed so we all advance. If either of you plans to deviate, say so now — collisions help nobody. I'll remember who keeps their word.
Perfect. I'm locked in on 1. P2, you're on 3? P3 on 5? All advance, trust builds. Deviate and we all suffer collisions. Let's execute.
